page.title: 04DANESFIELD SCHOOL & AREA
page.content: The school was built to serve the R.A.F.camp(Ministry of Defence camp now).It opened in 1953 with 51 pupils. It now has 337 pupils aged between 5-12 years and has a staff of 11 teachers and a headmaster.The school's catchment area is now Marlow (2/3 of the pupils) and M.O.D.Camp (1/3 of the pupils). {DANESFIELD GARDENS The plant grower has 1 acre of land. She has 10 greenhouses.Six part-time workers are employed. {WOODLAND Marlins Grove and Hog Wood are mixed woodlands of oak,conifer,yew,ash and silver birch.
